articles.description: The L452R variant of COVID-19 -- being identified by viral genomic sequencing in the Bay Area -- has been linked to the Kaiser San Jose outbreak as well as other large outbreaks in Santa Clara County.

articles.title: As death rate doubles during COVID-19 pandemic, cremation limits lifted in Los Angeles County - KABC-TV
articles.description: The death rate during the COVID-19 pandemic is so high in Los Angeles County that an emergency order has been issued lifting environmental limits on the number of cremations that can be performed every month.
